title: Azir's automatic first point in ARAM
body:
I actually find it very annoying how Azir AUTOMATICALLY has a point in his W when he starts in ARAM

I absolutely understand why this is, he MUST take W before any other ability. 

THIS SCREWS ME UP EVERY TIME!

I have a habit (a bad habit, I'll grant you that) of automatically holding Ctrl then pressing Q, W, & E. 

With Azir, this means I have the automatic point in W, then I put a point in Q, and a second point in W, THEN I'M OUT OF POINTS. 

This is my fault, I acknowledge that, but I wish they would just let me put the point in that ability myself. 

They don't do this on Summoner's Rift, why do it on ARAM?

Simply make it so that I have to put the point in W **myself**, THEN I'll put a point into Q and E.

replies.body: It is a small thing but I agree.  They don't do it on the rift so there is no reason to make it different on one map randomly.

It's because you literally can't use spells without his W and since you can put multiple points in one skill there's a chance you can skip your W and be completely useless until you decide to put a point in it

Not if they still just make W the only thing you can put your first point in like on Summoner's Rift. 

This might still be a little annoying, but if I HAD to put a point in W before any others, and I were to try to push Ctrl and Q, nothing would happen. 

Then I would press W, then E, putting a point into both of those. 

Then I would be confused as to why I still have a point and I would realize that I'm an idiot and I'm playing Azir. 
 
Put a point in Q. 

Problem solved.
do you really need e that bad?  i always take 1 point in q and 2 in w as azir in atam, no need to hard engage right out the gate as a squishy

Do I need it? No

But I like to have it for situations where I could use it. 

Better to have it and not need it than to need it and not have it.
ah, the old condom dilemma, just gotta gir gud at pulling out at the right time
